site.title: EnoTrattoria - Invitaly, Italian Restaurant
site.description: Italian restaurant with contemporary cuisine consisting fresh ingredients and quality seafood.

hero.p: The Invitaly kitchen relies mostly on imported products from Italy to meet the authenticity of Italian cuisine.

about.p1: A taste of the most genuine Italian gastronomic tradition with a touch of innovation. Only the best quality ingredients and freshest product are selected with great care and attention, reflecting in the seasonally changing menus that are wide-ranging to suit all palates.
about.p2: Invitaly EnoTrattoria is located in the most prestigious neighborhood - Josefov, in the heart of Prague. The refined location combines restored interiors with an architectural influence and hides a few unexpected surprises within.

menu.p: Our aim is to provide a wide selection of Italian cuisine to enjoy mouth-watering meals, seafood with family, friends and colleagues.

review.q: Fabulous, unassuming and surprising find. Great variety and fine tasting menu. Exciting food with high quality presentation and chef's inventiveness.
review.caption: —Jiří Štochl

pizzeria.p: Visit our sister restaurant to taste delicious Italian pizzas and pastas.
